DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness FID 112903 ( SYSTANE ULTRA® Lubricating Drops ) plus standard care standard care alone , subject history intermittent eye irritation dryness related environmental factor schedule routine cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Evaluation SYSTANE® ULTRA Patients Scheduled Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients must least 18 year age Patients must seek routine cataract extraction monofocal intraocular lens implantation Patients eyes meet inclusion criterion either eye meet exclusion criterion . Patients history hypersensitivity component FID 112903 . Patients previous intraocular corneal surgery plan within 30 day . Patients use ocular medication test article standard care postop medication past 14 day study . Patients chronic systemic corticosteroid immunosuppressive therapy . Patients history steroidresponsive rise intraocular pressure , glaucoma , preoperative Intraocular pressure > 25 millimeter mercury either eye . Patients history and/or current evidence following : clinically significant corneal scarring , blepharitis macular pathology either eye , Herpes zoster Herpes simplex keratitis .
